Objective: Verify My account dropdown without login
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click My account dropdown in header
Expected Result: The My account dropdown should show Login and Register buttons
Actual Result: The My account dropdown shows Login and Register buttons

Objective: Verify My account dropdown after login
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click My account dropdown in header
Expected Result:
The My account dropdown should show below buttons:
My Account
Order History
Transactions
Downloads
Logout
Actual Result:
The My account dropdown shows below buttons:
My Account
Order History
Transactions
Downloads
Logout

Objective: Verify going to My account page from My account dropdown
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account dropdown in header
2) Click My account
Expected Result: The User should be taken to My Account page
Actual Result: The User is taken to My Account page

Objective: Verify the links and Topics on My account page from My Account page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account dropdown in header
2) Click My account
Expected Result: The links and topics should be according to requirements
Actual Result: The links and topics are according to requirements

Objective: Verify going to Account edit page from My account page link

Objective: Verify editing account by providing valid values
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account dropdown in header
2) Click My account
3) Click Edit your account information
4) Fill all the fields with valid values
5) Click continue
Test Data:

naruto@leafvillage.com
Password:
Dattebayo

Valid Values:

Last Name: Haruno
Email ID: sakura@leafvillage.com
Expected Result: The User should be navigated to My account page with the details edited
Actual Result: The User is navigated to My account page with the details edited

Objective: Verify editing account by providing no values
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click My account dropdown in header
2) Click My account
3) Click Edit your account information
4) Clear all the fields
5) Click continue
Expected Result:
The below field level warnings should be displayed
First Name field should show "First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!"
Last Name field should show "Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!"
E-Mail Address field should show "E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!"
Actual Result:
The below field level areshould be displayed
First Name field shows "First Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!"
Last Name field shows "Last Name must be between 1 and 32 characters!"
E-Mail Address field shows "E-Mail Address does not appear to be valid!"
